CustomField.description: True if this Product is Usage and needs to have fields updated for deployment. Settings for Deployment: Product2 Object: SBQQ__ChargeType__c = “Usage” Product2 Object: SBQQ__BillingType__c = Null Settings for Staging non-Deployment: Product2 Object: SBQQ__ChargeType__c = “Recurring” Product2 Object: SBQQ__BillingType__c = “Arrears”
CustomField.inlineHelpText: True if this Product is Usage and needs to have fields updated for deployment.
CustomField.label: ATG Usage
